text: N2.2 billion fraud: Why Nigeria dropped charges against Supreme Court Registrar, others — Official - Premium Times Premium Times The Nigerian government says it withdrew the charge against the Chief Registrar of the Supreme Court based on information provided during a plea bargain between the prosecution and the defendants. The Federal Government on Tuesday withdrew all …
